statements: DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%poor%'
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%poor%' OR sentiment_score < 0.2;
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE registration_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = '1ec692ba-48f6-4de1-977e-3cdf5bcfc941' AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = '1ec692ba-48f6-4de1-977e-3cdf5bcfc941' AND date_posted < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM feedback_survey WHERE survey_id = 1 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM review_sentiment WHERE review_id = 5 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM support_services WHERE service_type = 'Technical Support' AND feedback_id IS NULL;
DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%';
